column8:
The Wounded Angel is an interesting piece of art by the Finnish painter Hugo Simberg.

It shows a wounded angel being carried by two boys who look very sad and somber. The interesting thing is that Simberg has always declined to offer any explanations for the meaning of the painting and just said it was up to the viewer to make their own conclusions on it.

This to me, makes it even more appealing and mysterious!
column21: The Wounded Angel is an interesting piece of art by the Finnish painter
